org.opennaas.extension.idb.reservation
Class PathFinderNG

java.lang.Object
  org.opennaas.extension.idb.reservation.PathFinderNG

public class PathFinderNG
extends java.lang.Object

This class manages a path computer to instance to find an available path, either for an availability request or for a reservation request.
